Summary: Red and blue crafts manuevering and accelerating wildly.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Riverton
There were no other sightings in Riverton on or around May 30th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were in our backyard sitting by a fire at around 10pm. We looked over our back fence and she noticed these two objects, each were slowly changing colors from red to blue to greenish. The objects cycled through their colors over the span of about 2 or 3 seconds. We got the video camera out (I dont know how to attach the file) and video taped them for about 5 minutes. The objects appeared to be over Camp Williams (reserve base). What was so strange was the way that they were manuevering. They would accelerate rapidly and then change direction very quickly. After video taping for 5 minutes, the objects disappeared.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
